title: Waiting Room - Terra
description: These are the details of your application. Your submission will be soon reviewed by the Terra team. You can check for updates in this page.

statusDescription.unsubmitted: You have not submitted your application yet.
statusDescription.accepted: Your application has been accepted. You can now use the platform.
statusDescription.rejected: Your application has been rejected. You will be able to re-apply in 7 days.
